content: In number 4 of the PSET, it says that the steps taken in the bisection search may vary based on how it was implemented. In one of the cases in ps1_tester.py, my program takes 11 steps as opposed to the expected 12, so it is registering as a failure. Will this effect how my work is graded?
subject: PSET 1 Student Tester

content: Yes. Check to make sure you don't have any "off by one" errors, i.e. are you updating your variables in the right places?
